Entry.JapaneseText: ……どうしたというんだ、この冷え込みようは…… さっきまでの暖かさがウソのようだ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Where has this sudden chill come from? It's hard to believe that it was warm just a minute ago...

Entry.JapaneseText: いきなり雪だもんネ…… なんだろう……異常気象かな？
Entry.EnglishText: This snow just came out of nowhere... Could this be... some sort of freak weather?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いや、どうもそれだけでは なさそうだ……
Entry.EnglishText: No, I doubt that's the only thing going on here...
